item.description: We'll be meeting 6:30-8:00pm on Monday night. Look forward to seeing everyone and their positive energy! Also to help cover costs of this meetup site and place we meet we're asking for a small donation of $3-$5. See you then!
item.how_to_find_us: Same place in Scarborough. We'll send you address if you don't have it.
item.why: Let's keep our vibrations high by watching and listening and then discussing. What are you working on that we can help you with to stayed focused and make a reality? Remember... continue to focus on what you want and not want you don't want.
item.name: Watch a short movie to inspire our conversation!
